item.description:
We have seen DCMS at the yacht club, we have seen them at Tiki, we have even seen them at the Tap.  But we haven't seen them at the Grog! 

So let's get together for what we are sure will be a fun and exciting night, you never know what will happen, who you will see OR who will be playing the cow bell with the band (please not me!).

 

9.9.11 UPDATE: We have 2 booths for all of us (yes it is posted on 2 of our MU sites), and there is a $5.00 cover charge to see the band.  Trust us they ARE worth it, with all the fun and laughter you will have tonight you may wonder why the restaurant doesn't charge more!!  This is sure to be another awesome night with some awesome people!

 

 

What you need to know about this event:

  • We will be meeting for dinner before hand, please put in your RSVP whether you will joining us for that or just coming to see/dance with the band, so we can make a reservation.
  • If your coming to dinner, please bring cash it is easier to figure out the bill that way.
  • Polish up them dancing shoes and bring them (your will need them). 

 

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

If you can't find us, running late, or need to cancel the meetup cell is: 978-304-2811.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change. 


We look forward to seeing you at the Grog!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside at the table(s).
item.name: DCMS at the Grog
